name: starter-theme-wp
description: Wordpress Starter Theme by Docker & Vite
author: YEVHENII VOLOSIUK

scripts.build: cross-env NODE_ENV=production vite build && npm run press:images
scripts.db:import--disable: gzip -dfk sql/wpenv.sql.gz && npm run wp:env run cli wp db import sql/wpenv.sql && rm -f sql/wpenv.sql
scripts.db:export--disable: npm run wp:env run cli wp db export sql/wpenv.sql; gzip -f sql/wpenv.sql
scripts.wp:restart--disable: npm run wp:env start --update && npm run wp:env run cli 'wp rewrite flush --hard'
scripts.wp:setup--disable: npm run wp:start && npm run db:import && npm run wp:env run cli 'wp rewrite flush --hard'
scripts.lint:check: npm run lint:php && npm run lint:js && npm run lint:scss && npm run lint:html
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:php:fix && npm run lint:js:fix && npm run lint:scss:fix && npm run lint:html:fix
scripts.lint:fix--disable: markuplint src/**/*.html && stylelint --fix src/assets/**/*.{css,scss} && eslint --cache --fix src/assets/**/*.js
